Literature.Title: Total Synthesis and Pharmacological Investigation of Cordyheptapeptide A.
Literature.Author: Kumar S, Dahiya R, Khokra SL, Mourya R, Chennupati SV, Maharaj S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=6µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=6µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=25µg/ml),Microsporum audouinii(MIC=6µg/ml),Aspergillus niger(no activity data),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=6µg/ml),Dalton's lymphoma ascites(IC50=19.9µM),Ehrlich's ascites carcinoma(IC50=22.6µM)
